summary: Mental rumination before bed is associated with longer sleep onset latency.
observed_patterns: High evening stress → difficulty falling asleep
Rumination at night → delayed sleep onset
implication_logic: If stress is high in evening logs, sleep difficulty may follow.

summary: Stress can alter appetite and digestive comfort. Heavy meals during high stress may feel worse than lighter, easy options.
observed_patterns: Stress high → appetite change (up or down)
Stress + heavy meal → discomfort or bloating
implication_logic: If stress is elevated and digestion is sensitive, lighter meals and hydration often help more than volume.
intervention_leverage: Light, easy meals and steady hydration on high-stress days. No pressure on amount.
